title: yet another patented yellow rant, this time supports that take credit where credit isnt due.
body:
If you are playing leona and the enemy adc isnt stunned for atleast 50% of the fight, gtfo of my lane and stop saying you are the reason i am fed, you havnt done shit.

if you are alistair and you dont engage every fight with a headbutt knockup combo and stay engaged in the fight with ulti soaking up the damage, dont even mention yourself when it comes to why lane won, because you havnt done shit.

If you are a support in general, and you stand behind your adc while he cs's instead of harassing and zoning? tfo you havnt done shit.

And lastly, if you are support and there isnt atleast 1 ward in bot lane at all times, then gtfo you aint shit, hell there should be 3, but im being nice and only saying 1.

If any of this sounds like you? Then dont fret, you may be mediocre at support, but chances are you dont take credit for your adcs kills, unless you do, in which case gtfo.

replies.body: but when you die its your supports fault?

only if it actually is.

Omg *gasp* people who hate bronze players sometimes actually know they are shit thats amazing yeah?

If you overextended and they couldn't save you is it their fault too? Or if they are just a bad support and they overextended, if you're so smart and knew it was bad then why did you follow them far enough to die? THEIR death might be their fault but yours? Questionable.

I dont think you understand where did i say i was overextended? i was literally underneath my t1 turret for most of my deaths, infact i was trapped there most of the game, i didnt need ganks to stop me dying half way into the lane, i needed ganks to stop me dying under turret.

And as for your hypothetical sitaution i dont over extend, i actually expect my support to be infront of my in lane at all times, if i die someone fucked up HARD.

My point is that it's actually very difficult for a support to get you killed. If it's a Blitzcrank and he pulls someone into you, or an Ali headbutt or something like that sure, but it doesn't happen often unless it's intentional. It was in response to the first comment as well.
Jesus. You are my favorite member of these boards. The shit that you speak is ABSOLUTE dross.
